roleset.name: to fail to carry out
roleset.note: RENEGE-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from renege.01-v)

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: Now UNESCO apologists are lobbying [President Bush]-1 [*-1]to renege on President Reagan 's decision [*] to depart .
example.arg: on President Reagan 's decision [*] to depart
